text: When I notice debt patterns forming, I recognize them and choose to understand causes and plan strategically instead.
During moments when debt feels overwhelming, I notice it and choose to understand the pattern and think ahead instead.
When I feel the pull to ignore debt patterns, I notice it and choose to understand causes and plan ahead instead.
